title: security issue of dumping heap profile through http api
body:
## Bug Report

Currently `/debug/pprof/heap` allows reading an arbitrary file, which is a severe security issue since most of tidb clusters were deployed by a user with admin permission:

https://github.com/tikv/tikv/blob/36a32504806411b3d620d3abff06166cc7296484/src/server/status_server/mod.rs#L189-L194
